EASTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
LIBYA.
DNC 09.
VESSEL, 18 PERSONS ON BOARD, DISABLED
AND ADRIFT IN VICINITY 34-08.00N 020-30.00E
AT 072115Z SEP. VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED
TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO JRCC LIBYA,
